description: The function 'unique_name_320' is vulnerable to OS command injection. The function uses 'spawnSync' to execute a command that includes user-supplied input ('opts.sqlclPath', 'opts.connectString', 'opts.directory', 'opts.appID', 'opts.destination', 'opts.pluginName'). An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands via these inputs, leading to arbitrary command execution on the server.
